description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
presentation of the experiment to the ape participants - usually numerical
false belief - experimenter did not witness the assistant transfer the object to another box / true belief- experimenter witnessed where the object was placed
which box the participant touched first
